description: "The border of the Kingdom of Siam is highlighted in yellow, including on an inset map of the Malay Peninsula. Mountains, rivers and settlements are marked, along with two large swamps in central Siam. A table translating Siamese terms is provided."
title: "Map of the Kingdom of Siam and its dependencies : Constructed from the Siamese Government surveys under the direction of J. McCarthy, F.R.G.S. Superintendent of Surveys [cartographic material]"
